articles.author: Prakriti Chanda
articles.title: Kraken exec explains Bitcoin’s looming ‘tipping point’ - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Amidst a BTC price pullback, Kraken's Head of Strategy tries to instill confidence in investors.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin dipped below the $70,000 threshold after a recent sell-off.
  • Exec highlighted BTCs volatility and its relatively small market cap, predicting an improved adoption curve.
